name: AnimeChar - Hyouka Mix | Chitanda Eru (千反田 える)
description:
Hi all, this is a sister project of AnimeFus - Kyo Mix v0.3, which trained with anime characters from KyoAni into a single model. On the other hand, AnimeChar aims to remake the character with higher quality using Lora, LoCon or LoHa based on our dataset.

In Hyouka Mix, we would like to introduce our new trained Lora model: Chitanda Eru (千反田 える), and yeah she is another KyoAni classical character :). In this batch we are trying to learn and tune different parameters to achieve better images, and we hope we can adapt some settings on future models.

Please check "About this version" to know more details about the model version and included characters. The model base is Anything v4.0.

You can support me and buy me a drink: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ryalandai

Enjoy and cheer :)

-- Please also support --

[Recommanded!] AnimeChar - Oshi Mix | Arima Kana (有馬 かな)

[Updated!] AnimeChar - Oshi Mix | Hoshino Rubi (星野瑠美衣) [v2.0]

AnimeChar - Oshi Mix | Hoshino Ai (星野 アイ)
AnimeChar - Liz Bird Mix | Kasaki Nozomi (傘木 希美)

AnimeChar - Tamako Mix | Kitashirakawa Tamako (北白川 たまこ) & Asagiri Shiori (朝霧 史織)

AnimeFus - Kyo Mix v0.3

Basic promt recommendation may refer to our sample images.
